posts.post_content: Im looking to purchase a T206 Ty Cobb Bat On or Off Version.I would prefer SGC graded but would consider other alternatives.While I would like to have a 40 or 50 budgetwise I am looking more in the 10 to 20 range just to knock this one off the list.Please email or pm me if you have anything available fitting this description.Just to not waste anyone's time my limit at the moment is under ....At that price I know this is a long shot but I have to see whats out there if anything.Thanks for any help.Jason
One bump to try to get a couple more options before I decide.Thanks to everyone who has contacted me on this purchase.
